department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程之目的在協助學生理解與學習於人工智慧以及機械學習領域之中的數學基礎，進而獲得對資料分析、建模與分群之能力。
goal.en: The purpose of this lecture is to help the participants easily understand and realize the fundamental mathematics in artificial intelligence and machine learning. Thus, they could analyze, model, and classify their data.

outline.ch:
Week 1~2: 線性映射
Week 3~4: 仿射空間
Week 5~6: 正交投影
Week 7~8: 旋轉
Week 9: 期中報告
Week 10~11: 特徵值分解與對角化
Week 12~13: 奇異值分解
Week 14~15: 矩陣梯度
Week 16~17: 背向傳遞與自動微分
Week 18: 期末報告
outline.en:
Week 1~2: Linear Mappings
Week 3~4: Affine Spaces
Week 5~6: Orthogonal Projections
Week 7~8: Rotations
Week 9: Midterm Presentation
Week 10~11: Eigen-decomposition and Diagonalization
Week 12~13: Singular Value Decomposition
Week 14~15: Gradients of Matrices
Week 16~17: Backpropagation and Automatic Differentiation
Week 18: final presentation.

textbook.ch:
1. Deep Learning (Adaptive Computation and Machine Learning series), by I. Goodfellow, Y. Bengio, and A. Courville
2. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning, by C. M. Bishop
3. Machine Learning - A Probabilistic Perspective, by K. P. Murphy
textbook.en:
1. Deep Learning (Adaptive Computation and Machine Learning series), by I. Goodfellow, Y. Bengio, and A. Courville
2. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning, by C. M. Bishop
3. Machine Learning - A Probabilistic Perspective, by K. P. Murphy

gradMethod.ch: 課程參與 20％、期中報告 40％、期末報告 40％
gradMethod.en: Participation 20％, midterm report 40％, and final report 40％.

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
